snippet: Nechemya Weberman’s trial is one of the first times a prominent member of the Satmar Hasidic community has faced child sex abuse charges before a secular court.
abstract: Nechemya Weberman, unlicensed ultra-Orthodox counselor, denies prosecutor's allegations that he repeatedly sexually abused a young girl in his care; trial marks one of the first times a prominent member of the Satmar Hasidic community of Williamsburg has faced child sex abuse charges before a secular court.
lead_paragraph: Nechemya Weberman’s trial is one of the first times a prominent member of the Satmar Hasidic community has faced child sex abuse charges before a secular court.

headline.seo: Nechemya Weberman Testifies in His Own Defense in Sexual Abuse Trial
headline.main: Hasidic Man Denies Abuse of Young Girl He Counseled
headline.print_headline: Hasidic Man Denies Abuse Of Young Girl He Counseled
